author: PaulHigin
body:
This means that PowerShell Core running on Windows will not detect system lockdown such as when DeviceGuard or AppLocker application allow policies are applied, and so won't automatically transition into constrained language mode.

This is a work item to re-implement these APIs for Windows platform and to finish porting the corresponding tests.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Not enough coverage on or usage of 6.0.0 yet to justify this for the 6.0.0 timeframe. Definitely necessary in the long-run though.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @PaulHigin Can we close the Issue? Seems fixed in #6133

comments.author: PaulHigin
comments.body: Yes, this issue is now closed.  Thanks.

title: Windows system lockdown APIs are currently stubbed out
